channel.title: Astro Release Notes
channel.description: Astronomer is committed to continuous delivery of both features and bug fixes to Astro. To keep your team up to date on what's new, this document will provide a regular summary of all changes released to Astro.

ul.li: In the Cloud UI, the People page now shows the IDs of users belonging to your Organization.
In the Cloud UI, the Deployments page now shows the user or API key that most recently updated each Deployment and when they updated it.
